name: ANGLE Technology Ventures
overview: ANGLE Technology Ventures Limited is the venture capital arm of ANGLE Plc specializing in pre-seed, seed, and early stage investments. The firm does not invest in existing technology businesses, intellectual property with limited patent protection, non-technology companies such as service businesses, specialty retail, consumer products, etc. It seeks to invest in software, networking and telecom, semiconductor design and fabrication, and wireless within information technology; diagnostics, medical devices, drug discovery, and therapeutics within life sciences; and also in nanotechnology and specialty materials. It seeks to commercialize intellectual property developed by technology partners in universities, research organizations, academic, private, and public sectors. The firm typically invests in companies based in the United Kingdom and the United States. ANGLE Technology Ventures Limited is based in Surrey, United Kingdom with additional offices across United States and United Kingdom.
